Run Lola Run is a German thriller from 1996,
which shows the same story of a woman trying

152.text:
to save her boyfriend from gangsters by bringing
them a large sum of money, with only 20 minutes

157.text:
to spare. The film shows her repeat 3 versions
of the same event, Rashomon style, each time

163.text:
In the final version of events, Lola heads
straight to a casino, betting her final 100

168.text:
marks on the number 20 in Roulette twice in
a row. She wins a total of 126,000 marks,

174.text:
just enough to save her boyfriend after having
him die two times before.

177.text:
Not only would this statistically almost never
happen, but it’s funny that from Lola’s

181.text:
perspective, this was her first attempt at
saving her boyfriend’s life. So she heads

185.text:
straight to the casino. Not the smartest money
making scheme, but since we love this film,

190.text:
we’ll give it a pass, even if it is completely
ridiculous.
